extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Catalysts in chemical reaction and Arc Reactor in Iron Man have the characteristic of Optimization
extended_metaphor.catalysts: Catalysts facilitate faster pathways and enhance system efficiency in chemical reactions by recalibrating energy barriers and minima to achieve optimal performance.
extended_metaphor.arc_reactor: Similarly, the Arc Reactor in Iron Man optimizes energy output and efficiency without altering the fundamental process by recalibrating energy flow to achieve peak performance.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Catalysts in chemical reaction and Arc Reactor in Iron Man have the characteristic of Simplification
extended_metaphor.catalysts: Catalysts simplify the route for reactants to traverse by redesigning complex systems to achieve optimal performance with minimal resources.
extended_metaphor.arc_reactor: Likewise, the Arc Reactor in Iron Man simplifies energy generation by redesigning the energy system for streamlined efficiency, achieving optimal performance with minimal input.
